name: War-O-Matic
description:
War-O-Matic the company that brings you the two button war!

Welcome to our christmas party and you sir/madam or other have been cordially invited to defend the honour of our esteemed Clone-O-Matic team.

Button A - Select Unit.
Button B - Build and Deploy Unit.

Merry Christmas from War-O-Matic.

Note: Browsers vary in WebGL performance. If the game does not play please try a different browser e.g. Edge, Chrome, Firefox

Ludum Dare #34 entry.
